EmailTemplate.description: DuPont™ Kevlar® and Nomex® Narrow Fabrics
EmailTemplate.name: DPS - DuPont™ Kevlar ® and Nomex® Narrow Fabrics
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont™ Kevlar® and Nomex ® Narrow Fabrics
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Salutation} {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
DuPont manufactures the Kevlar® and Nomex ®fiber. We have customers that take our product and manufacture Kevlar® and Nomex ®narrow fabrics.
Below is a list of customers that the team came up with that does netting and webbing. Let us know if we can be of any other assistance.
Atkins and Pearce www.atkinsandpearce.com Bally Ribbon www.ballyribbon.com Offray www.osnf.com Murdock Webbing www.murdockwebbing.com Hope Global www.hopeglobal.com Conneaut www.conneaut.com Carolina Narrow Fabrics www.carolinanarrowfabric.com Western Filament www.wfilament.com
Thank you for your visit to DuPont websites which provide additional information about Nomex®, Kevlar®, Tyvek® and other DuPont products.
DuPont Protection Solutions This source list is designed to present a representative group of suppliers. It may not necessarily include all the companies selling or making these products and is subject to revision at any time. It is not an endorsement of any specific manufacturer.
